extendedInfo.description: Get ready to flip out with 1001 Attempts!ENDLESSLY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAYTired of games that claim to be addictive? Well, you shouldn't be because addictive can be fun! 1001 Attempts introduced exciting yet simple gameplay elements that keep you coming back for more! HUGE CHALLENGELike many games on the Google Play, 1001 Attempts has that "one more try" aspect that is loved by players world wide. Dodge explosive missiles, flying sawblades, and freakin' laser beams while trying to rack up huge points in the worldwide leaderboards! SIMPLE TO LEARN, TOUGH TO MASTERThe plan is simple: Move left and right and jump across the level dodging danger and collecting jewels. How many can you collect before ultimately falling with glory?- Share your success with your friends through SnapChat, Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter!- Hilarious pop-culture references from Game of Thrones, Breaking Bad, Walking Dead, Mario, Zelda, Big Bang Theory, Angry Birds, Star Wars, and more! - Free To Play! 1001 Attempts is currently Free To Play so you can experience a world of not-so epic proportions! Clash of Clans, Candy Crush Saga, Minecraft, Dragonvale, and Poker all let you download for free.Everplay Interactive is a new company to take on the free to play market that is dominated by the likes of Zynga, Electronic Arts, Kabam, Nimblebit, and Supercell!1001 Attempts has received Fantastic Reviews from great sources such as Kotaku, IGN, TouchArcade, PocketGamer, SlideToPlay, and more!"A Flashing, Frantic, Four-Quarter Trip to the Arcade" - TouchArcade.com"I instantly got addicted to this game after just a few tries at delaying the inevitable death." - AppAdvice.com"Disney won't approve of the wanton death, but we sure do!""Hail to your pocket god devices! Great time waster here.""Great time killer while you wait for Game of Thrones, Breaking Bad, Walking Dead, or Big Bang Theory to return to television! Better than wasting time on YouTube and Vine.""Free To Play games completely remove the barrier of entry for players. Now players can download Temple Run, Despicable Me, Hay Day, Minecraft, and Jetpack Joyride for Free and enjoy their time without spending a dime." Follow Everplay on Twitter @EverplayGames for up to date information on news, updates, and future games releases!You can find 1001 Attempts by searching: Difficult, Super Meat Boy, Mario, Sonic, Link, Zelda, Metroid, Super Hexagon, Candy Crush.

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: Fun game, wish there was more variety to it though. Different levels with platforms maybe, something other than a grey background, unlocks, etc.
reviews.author: Anthony N

reviews.title: Fantastic game
reviews.comment: I love everything about this game. The art style is unique, the gameplay is hugely addictive, and it\'s just a lot of fun to play. I love the recent addition of the online leaderboards! Great job guys!
reviews.author: Craig Maxwell

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: BUT here are some suggestions to make the game even better! I feel like you should be able to buy upgrades with the gems. For example. Upgrades for power ups that randomly appear, and with each upgrade the power up lasts longer. Power ups could be a magnet (close range), speed increased, and a shield.  Or just to buy different backgrounds! P.S. sorry if this has already been suggested P.S.S. for some reason my phone says this game is malware? Or just dangerous. .. could this be fixed?  Thank you!
reviews.author: Alec Burmeister

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: Since your only reward for for playing the game is obtaining suits, it would be better if you could add a selection screen where you could choose your favorite skin. Also I noticed some lag in parts of the game. If these things could be fixed or added that would be nice.
reviews.author: Zota Neth

reviews.title: Awesome quickie!
reviews.comment: Love the game. Awesome retro graphics, nice sounds.  But on my GS2 GTI9100 it crashes almost after every 2nd game. Please look into it. It usually happens when I die by a laser as far as I observed.
reviews.author: Vipul Jain

reviews.title: LOVE IT
reviews.comment: My favorite game!!!!! I have a short temper with some games, but this one makes it so fun even if I die. Also is the best working game on my LG Lucid, never freezes or gives me trouble. Very happy with this app.
reviews.author: Bee Vozza

reviews.title: Gotta go fast gotta go fast
reviews.comment: Ok, this game is so awesome that managed to make me to play a precision based game with touchscreen controls and with my fingers over almost half of the danger alerts on screen... the only other game that could make do this was jetpack joyride.
reviews.author: pedro figueira

reviews.title: Good Game for free.
reviews.comment: I seriously believe that you don\'t get a good game for free, I took my chances with this and believe me you can\'t get more for free. There are games like windup knight but that\'s a different game altogether. Download it and you won\'t regret.
reviews.author: Kapil Chaudhary

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I wish you could change your skin
reviews.author: Ty Beller

reviews.title: Very funny
reviews.comment: It\'s Awesome!! The only bad thing is, I can\'t access the unlocked characters cause I don\'t see an option on the menu...
reviews.author: Martin Cerdeira

reviews.title: Awesome and simple.
reviews.comment: Wish you could choose the skins you want to play with but I still like the randomized skin equipping. A bit of lag on hard mode, still trying though!
reviews.author: ADEASnM Symonette

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I can\'t adjust the volume. Otherwise it\'s good
reviews.author: Andrew Ha

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Fun game.Controls are spot on & try leaping legends from dis great dev. Pocketgamer awarded a bronze medal. It\'s really fun
reviews.author: Rohit Bhatia

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great games but i cant see the warning when using the on screen button
reviews.author: Kamal Adri

reviews.title: Needs a proper character select
reviews.comment: please please please oh god please have a proper character selection screen.
reviews.author: adamcheetos

reviews.title: Great game..an  8 bit game
reviews.comment: Friend rates best I rate like 3rd place dodge strategy game also   for iPhone.. I just played it for like 3 hours and my phone didn\'t die  ;)
reviews.author: Zachary Burroughs
